participant_1.background:
My work life is boring, but I love my whiskey and Comic Con.
people do not like me too much but i like them anyways.
I think I should bake my grandson some chocolate cake for his birthday.
I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college.
I love to play with my cat Mater when I have free time.

participant_2.background:
I'd rather not disclose my family's occupations.
I didn't spend much time with my family, but I improved my English and made a lot of new friends.
I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing.
i wish i didn t have to work.
I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.

content.text: What do you do for work?
I am a cake decorator.
That sounds fun. I love chocolate cake. What's your favorite thing to bake?
I really enjoy making wedding cakes. I get to be creative and make something beautiful for people to enjoy on their special day.
That's so cool. I love to bake, but I'm not very creative. I usually just make chocolate chip cookies or brownies.
I love brownies too! They're so easy to make and they're always a hit.
What's your favorite thing to do when you're not working?
I love to spend time with my family and friends. We go on a lot of hikes and camping trips. I also love to read and play video games.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love to go hiking too. I'm not very good at camping, but I enjoy the outdoors. I also love to read. What are your favorite books?
I love to read anything by Stephen King or Dean Koontz. They're both great horror writers. I also love to read historical fiction and fantasy novels.
I've never read any of Stephen King's books, but I've heard good things about them. I'll have to check them out. I love historical fiction too. Have you read any of Ken Follett's books?
Yes, I love Ken Follett! I've read all of his books. They're so good.
Me too! I think he's one of the best historical fiction writers out there.
I agree. He's so good at creating realistic characters and settings.
I'm glad we agree. We should talk about books more sometime.
That would be fun. I love talking about books.
Me too. I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too. I have a huge stack of books that I need to read.
I know the feeling. I have a whole bookshelf full of books that I haven't read yet.
I think we're going to be good friends.
I think so too. We have a lot in common.
